home.info: Use our drag `n` drop resume builder to build Resume within 10 minutes and earn while at it.

cards.title: Build CV with drag n drop builder.
cards.text: Build a professional resume template and publish. You earn NEAR token as people use your template, your template is ranked high based on template ratings.

cards.title: Review CV's and Earn NEAR token.
cards.text: Are you a recruiter? Review users CV's and earn NEAR token, correct CV's and suggest tips to help them ace their interview.

cards.title: Rate CV template and Earn NEAR token.
cards.text: So you love that CV template after using it, rate the CV and earn NEAR token, help the CV template grow popularity.

cards.title: Search, filter available jobs based on your profession.
cards.text: View Job listing based on your profession, Goodluck in your application
